item.title: Video Editor needed to make exciting videos for high-profile construction sites - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor to help me make short 1-2 minute videos that focus on construction projects.  I currently do this work myself, but due to lack of time and lack of expertise, I want to delegate it to a professional.  I will provide the footage, you provide the passion - the key to this job is to make each video as exciting and impressive as it can be and that takes effort.  If you are just looking to mash some video clips together, this isn't the job for you.  I am looking for a long-term partner who I can rely on and is self-motivated to deliver the absolute best product they can.

In addition to the 1-2 minute video I mentioned above, you should also be able to create the dynamic and compelling videos of the following:
Presentation, Timelapse, Drone Time Lapse, Corporate Events, and Commercial Real Estate.  The ideal candidate will also be able to produce different versions of the same video for use on different platforms i.e. YouTube, Instagram, LinkedIn, etc.

My expectation is that your work result is of high quality.  To me, this means - at a minimum - transitions, graphics, logo animations, color correction, audio, etc.  Also, the ideal candidate would suggest ways I can improve the raw footage (better angles, different types of shots, camera settings, filters, drone settings, etc.)  to make the end result even better.  Attention to detail is critical - it doesn't do me any good to spend my time correcting errors that could have been caught with a quick review.  Candidate must be fluent in English.  You'll also notice this position is for a one-time project, but the reality is that I do 3-4 videos per month and I want to use the same person over and over, as the more we work together the easier the process will get.

Please send over a quick bit about who you are, why you'd be great for this position, any relevant experience, and pertinent portfolio work.

Thanks, and I am looking forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 19, 2024 16:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

My expectation is that your work result is of high quality.  To me, this means - at a minimum - transitions, graphics, logo animations, color correction, audio, etc.  Also, the ideal candidate would suggest ways I can improve the raw footage (better angles, different types of shots, camera settings, filters, drone settings, etc.)  to make the end result even better.  Attention to detail is critical - it doesn't do me any good to spend my time correcting errors that could have been caught with a quick review.  Candidate must be fluent in English.  You'll also notice this position is for a one-time project, but the reality is that I do 3-4 videos per month and I want to use the same person over and over, as the more we work together the easier the process will get.

Please send over a quick bit about who you are, why you'd be great for this position, any relevant experience, and pertinent portfolio work.

Thanks, and I am looking forward to hearing from you!

Budget: $150

item.title: Video Editing and Social Media Layovers - Upwork
item.description:
Please take the files I am giving you and create a few things for me.

All videos should be edited in portrait mode. https://we.tl/t-hjQh22SPNH.

The first part of the video is a conversation about how insurance rates are rising. Minutes 0:00 - 35:00. - I need you to create as many 15-45 second videos for each person talking. We are having a conversation about insurance and I am trying to use this for instagram stories and facebook stories.

I would like to put layovers of the words and our logo on these clips if possible. Im hoping you can create 20-40  mini video clips from these talks.

2) 36:30- We discuss a few insurance topics like- insuring a child, renting your pool. - I want you to edit these videos as a back and forth conversation between two insurance agents. You can switch the camera back and forth.

-- Please remove the ahhs, umms, the curse words, and the repeated takes. And please lay subtitles over everything.

3) can you do a blooper and out take video?

Budget: $160
Posted On: June 19, 2024 16:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Dialogue Editing, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Social Media Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Facebook Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can create engaging and eye-catching Facebook ads. The ideal candidate should have experience in creating short videos that capture attention and effectively promote products or services. As a video editor, you will be responsible for selecting and editing footage, adding text and graphics, and optimizing the final product for social media platforms. Attention to detail and the ability to work within brand guidelines are essential.
  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g. Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong understanding of visual storytelling and video composition
  - Ability to create compelling and visually appealing ads
  - Knowledge of current social media trends and best practices for video content
  
This will be monthly on going work. We are seeking an High level video editor who can deliver high-quality results within the given timeframe. If you have a portfolio that showcases your previous work in creating effective Facebook ads, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial, Video Production
Country: United Kingdom

item.title: Explanation Video in several languages - Upwork
item.description:
I need an explanation video for patients.
The video is watched by parents who need to go to dentist with their kids and the kids get dental treatment in general anesthesia.
Several things are important prior to the treatement:
1. the kids need to be healthy 14 days prior to treatment without fever and cough. If kids get sick, parents need to call us.
2. on day of treatment, kids need to be fasting for 6 hrs for solid food and can drink water or apple juice until 1 hour before treatment. To avoid accidental food intake, kids should not go to school or kindergarten on day of treatment
3. parents got a list of several things to bring, such as towels, linnen etc. and should be reminded to check the list.

The video should be done in german and several other languages:
- english, russion, arabic and if possible even in more languages. We could start with english version for easier communication.

Hourly Range: $36.00-$48.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:46 UTC
Category: 2D Animation
Skills:Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: Video Production, Video Editing
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: 🎥🇫🇷 Monteur / Editeur Vidéo pour Youtube 🌟 - Upwork
item.description:
LISEZ LA DESCRIPTION AVANT DE POSTULER

Nous recherchons un Expert en Montage Vidéo pour créer des vidéos captivantes et informatives pour notre chaîne YouTube. Si vous avez une expérience avérée dans le montage vidéo et que vous êtes passionné par la création de contenu engageant, cette opportunité est faite pour vous !

#### Rôle et Responsabilités :
- Monter des vidéos captivantes pour YouTube.
- Créer des vidéos shorts dynamiques et attrayantes.
- Assurer la fluidité des vidéos et ajouter des effets pour offrir la meilleure expérience possible.
- Collaborer avec l'équipe pour garantir la cohérence et la qualité des contenus.
- S'inspirer des styles de montage des vidéos suivantes :
  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r3gYQ4Vf5XU
  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IkmPjeNKkBQ
  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gVTxEmXH4hc

#### Compétences et Expériences Requises :
- Expérience solide en montage vidéo.
- Capacité à éditer facilement des vidéos avec des outils comme Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, etc.
- Créativité et souci du détail.
- Capacité à travailler de manière autonome et à respecter les délais.

### Pourquoi nous rejoindre :
- Possibilité de déboucher sur un travail à long terme.
- Équipe très structurée avec du contenu récurrent.
- Retours honnêtes et objectifs pour une amélioration continue.

Postulez maintenant 🚀


Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, French, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Education, Social Media Marketing, Montage
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, French, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Education, Social Media Marketing, Montage
Country: France

item.title: Video Editor for Sports Card Membership Program Promotion - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to create a captivating and sales-driven promotional video for our sports card membership program. The video will be used on YouTube and Facebook, so it needs to be engaging, interactive, and in VSL (video sales letter) format. The goal is to attract potential customers and entice them to join our program.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit raw footage and add visual effects, graphics, and animations
  - Incorporate engaging transitions and sound effects
  - Ensure the video is of high quality and meets our brand guidelines
  - Optimize the video for YouTube and Facebook platforms
  
  Required skills:
  - Proficiency in CapCut video editing software
  - Strong creativity and storytelling abilities
  - Knowledge of VSL format and sales-driven editing techniques
  
  Size: Medium
  Duration: 1 to 3 months
  Expertise: Intermediate

item.title: Video Sourcer for YouTube Automation - Upwork
item.description:
Position Overview:
We are seeking a dedicated and detail-oriented Video Sourcer to join our YouTube automation team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for sourcing and curating high-quality video clips from various online platforms to support our video editor in creating engaging and compelling YouTube content. This role requires a keen eye for detail, a deep understanding of online video content, and the ability to identify the most captivating scenes that will enhance our video productions.

Key Responsibilities:

Research and Sourcing: Identify and source high-quality video clips from various online platforms, including YouTube, Vimeo, stock footage sites, and social media.
Curating Content: Curate and organize video clips based on specific themes, genres, and project requirements provided by the video editor and content strategist.
Quality Assessment: Assess the quality and relevance of video clips to ensure they meet our content standards and align with the creative vision of our projects.
Collaboration: Work closely with the video editor to understand the needs of each project and provide timely and relevant video clips that enhance the final product.
Database Management: Maintain an organized database of sourced video clips, including proper tagging and categorization for easy retrieval.
Trends Monitoring: Stay up-to-date with current video trends and popular content to ensure our videos remain relevant and engaging.
Compliance: Ensure all sourced video clips comply with copyright laws and obtain necessary permissions or licenses when required.



Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube
Skills: YouTube
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative individual to join our team as a TikTok Content Creator. In this role, you will be responsible for producing engaging and entertaining TikTok videos based on ideas we have and helping us come up with new and exciting concepts. You will also be in charge of posting the videos on our TikTok account. As a TikTok Content Creator, you should have a strong understanding of the TikTok platform and the ability to create content that appeals to our target audience.

Skills:
- Proficient in TikTok video creation
- Creative and innovative mindset
- Strong storytelling abilities
- Excellent videography and editing skills
- Familiarity with current TikTok trends and challenges

We are looking for someone who can work independently and deliver high-quality videos on a regular basis. This is a great opportunity to showcase your creativity and grow your portfolio in the world of TikTok content creation.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:25 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:TikTok, UGC, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Writing, TikTok Marketing, TikTok Video
Skills: TikTok, UGC, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Creation, Marketing, Content Writing, TikTok Marketing, TikTok Video

- Excellent videography and editing skills
- Familiarity with current TikTok trends and challenges

We are looking for someone who can work independently and deliver high-quality videos on a regular basis. This is a great opportunity to showcase your creativity and grow your portfolio in the world of TikTok content creation.

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400

Category: Voice Talent

item.title: YouTube Production Expert Needed ASAP - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a YouTube production expert who can assist us in finding the best recording equipment and setting up our studio. The ideal candidate should have a deep understanding of the YouTube platform and be up-to-date with the latest trends and techniques in video production. The main responsibilities of this role will include researching and recommending the most suitable equipment based on our requirements and budget, as well as providing guidance on studio setup and optimization.

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video production techniques
    - Knowledge of various recording equipment and accessories
    - Familiarity with studio setup and optimization
    - Understanding of YouTube best practices

    This is a medium-sized project that is expected to last for 1 to 3 months. We are seeking an intermediate-level expert who can effectively communicate and collaborate with our team to achieve the desired results. If you have a passion for YouTube production and a talent for creating high-quality content, we would love to hear from you!

Hourly Range: $17.00-$44.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Marketing, YouTube Development, YouTube, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
